ca.corefacility.gview.layout.prototype

Interface BackbonePinnable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, GViewEventListener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BackboneTextItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBackboneTextItem, BackboneLabelItem, BackboneTextItemImp, PinnableShape

    public interface BackbonePinnable
extends GViewEventListener
    Describes something that can be "pinned" to a particular location on the backbone, so that it always stays there no matter the zoom level.
    Author:
    Aaron Petkau

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SequencePoint getPinnedPoint() 
      void pinTo(SequencePoint pinnedPoint)
      Pins this item to the passed point on the passed backbone.
      void translate(double base, double heightFromBackbone)
      Translates this pinnable item by the passed base/height values.

      • Methods inherited from interface ca.corefacility.gview.map.event.GViewEventListener

        eventOccured

    • Method Detail

      • pinTo

        void pinTo(SequencePoint pinnedPoint)
        Pins this item to the passed point on the passed backbone.
        Parameters:
        pinnedPoint - The point where we should pin the item.

      • translate

        void translate(double base,
             double heightFromBackbone)
        Translates this pinnable item by the passed base/height values.
        Parameters:
        base - The base to translate by.
        heightFromBackbone - The height to translate by.

      • getPinnedPoint

        SequencePoint getPinnedPoint()
        Returns:
        The point we have pinned this item to.
